Authors:
Jay kant Raut, Akira Suzuki, Toshimitsu Fukiharu, Kiminori
Shimizu, Susumu Kawamoto, Chihiro Tanaka
Title:
Coprinopsis neophlyctidospora sp. nov. a new ammonia fungus
from boreal forest in Canada
Keywords:
Biogeography, criptic species, ITS, species-complex,
taxonomy
Abstract:
Coprinopsis neophlyctidospora sp. nov. (Basidiomycota,
Agaricales), collected in urea treated soil of boreal forests from
Canada is described and illustrated. Its micromorphological features,
phylogenetic analysis and mating test delineate this taxon as a new
species. In addition, its ecological characters also indicate it is a
new ammonia fungus.
